metadata.description: This comic series has been featured on CNN, Fox News, and OK! Magazine. This one-shot features the United States' latest First Lady, Michelle Obama. A mother, political force, and now, wife of the 44th President of the United States, Barack Obama, it's obvious that Michelle Obama has lived a life many have only dreamed of. Continuing Bluewater's examination of strong female figures in politics, this visual biography will examine Michelle's life in detail to help find her context in modern history.
metadata.name: Female Force
